content: little ninja items needed small amount of worsted weight yarn in black and flesh f hook or hook needed to create a tight hole­less fabric with your yarn felt embroidery thread or doll eyes for the face note it s a good idea to leave a large tail of yarn when fastening off the body pieces then you just sew the pieces onto the body using the tail body and head 1 chain 10 in black 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet across until you get to the last chain single_crochet 3 in the last chain and then single_crochet down the back side of the chain to form a long skinny oval single_crochet 2 in the very first chain do not join 3 2sc in first st from last round next st from hook single_crochet across 8 sts 2sc in each of next 3 sts single_crochet across next 8 sts 2sc in each of next 2 sts 28 sts 4­17 single_crochet around 14 times 28 sts each round do not fasten_off leave stitch open note now is a good time to attach and embroider the face face 1 chain 8 in flesh tone 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 5 sts 3 single_crochet in last chain single_crochet along back side of chain 5 sts 2 single_crochet in beginning chain do not join 3 2 single_crochet in first st from last round single_crochet across next 5 sts 2sc in next st slip_stitch to next stitch tie off and attach black 4 with black single_crochet around entire face tie off and leave a long tail for sewing on now comes the trickiest part the legs it isn t all that tricky really just involves keeping track of the beginning of the row and counting first leg legs are made directly onto the body insert hook into the open body stitch 1 single_crochet across 7 sts instead of continuing around in a circle single_crochet into the stitch on the other side of the body the stitch which is the 7th single_crochet from the beginning of the round going the opposite direction from which you re crocheting in this will separate the body and you ll be working on just one leg which should be 14 sts around half the number of body sts 2­6 single_crochet around these 14 sts 5 times 7 decrease every st 7sts 8 decrease every st 4sts finish off and sew hole shut second leg 1 attach yarn to very first single_crochet after the first leg with his face side facing you single_crochet in this st and single_crochet around 14 sts 2 single_crochet in the first st from the last round this should connect both sides to form a circle single_crochet around 14 sts 3­6 single_crochet around 14 sts note now is a good time to stuff the body 7 decrease every st 7sts 8 decrease every st 4sts finish off and sew hole shut arms make 2 1 5 single_crochet in magic_ring with black
